title: <model_name>!SHOW_GLOBAL_EVALUATION_METRICS | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Returns overall evaluation metrics for models where evaluation was enabled at instantiation.  This method
takes no arguments. See Metrics in show_global_evaluation_metrics.
The name of the dataset used for metrics calculation, currently EVAL.
The method of aggregation used to calculate overall metrics from the individual class metrics, currently MACRO.
The error metric name. Can include Precision, Recall, F1, etc.
